resources.string: Find out what you know about it!
1. What is the most common cause of cancer
4. Which imaging methods are dedicated for cancer detection
5. Which type of cancer is the most common among women?
I got %d scores in awesome CancerQuiz
Answer 1. Smoking. Smoking accounts for more than 1 in 4 UK cancer deaths, and nearly a fifth of all cancer cases.
Answer 2. Prostate cancer. PSA is a protein produced by normal cells in the prostate and also by prostate cancer cells.

Answer 3. Human papilloma viruses (HPVs) and Hepatitis C virus. HPV is responsible for developing cerevical and also anal cancer. Hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) is the fifth most common cancer, a major cause of death in patients with chronic hepatitis C virus infection.
Answer 4. Colonoscopy, mammography, CT. Colonoscopy for colorectal caner, mammography for breast cancer. CT allows to diagnose various types of cancer.
Answer 5. Breast caner. Breast cancer is a common cancer in women, but screening and therapy now make it treatable in many cases.
